title: Restore a Hacked Game Account
description: A player reports their account was compromised, their password changed, and valuable in-game items were stolen.

tasks.description: Verify the player's identity through security questions and previous purchase receipts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the player is the legitimate owner of the account.

tasks.description: Review the account's login and trade history to identify the unauthorized access and stolen items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a login from an unusual IP address followed by several item trades to another account.

tasks.description: Force a password reset and restore the stolen items to the player from a backup.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent secures the account and restores the player's inventory.

tasks.description: Ban the account that received the stolen items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent issues a ban to the fraudulent account.
